level.heading: PENALTIES (§ 7-3217) Except as provided in § 3213.3, an employer who willfully violates theequirements of the Act shall be assessed a civil penalty in the amount of fiveundred dollars ($500) for the first violation, seven hundred and fifty dollars$750) for the second violation, and one thousand dollars ($1,000) for the thirdnd any subsequent violations. All penalties paid by employers shall be deposited into the General Revenue Fundf the District of Columbia.
